CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-24 13:08
Subject: Transform Chalhoub Coming your way, Cyber Awareness, Vision 2033 - 33 Days Challenge, Vote for Love Note by Ghawali, Voice of Fashion, On Time. On Point.
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

This October, Transform is coming your way!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2060&user=10620> 	

Transform Week is coming soon. 
Join us for coffee, conversations, and an interactive experience to discover what’s changing and how it connects to your daily work.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2060&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-4-min.png> 	

Cyber Awareness: Watch, Learn, Act

Thank you to everyone who joined our first Cyber Town hall today! If you missed the town hall, watch the replay here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=6097&user=10620> .

chunks.text:
Thank you to everyone who joined our first Cyber Town hall today! If you missed the town hall, watch the replay here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=6097&user=10620> .

Our first Cyber kiosk opens Tuesday, 30 September at HO1 canteen. Come by at the kiosk, meet the team, and discover simple, powerful ways to make secure choices every day! 

Your engagement is what turns awareness into action. We look forward to seeing you throughout October as we build resilience together. 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=6098&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-7-min.png> 	

Vision 2033 - 33 Days Challenge

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2063&user=10620> 	

Sara REBEIZ , Director of Legal, reminds us that putting the consumer first opens the door to growth, innovation, and new opportunities, while safeguarding our ambitions with trust and compliance every step of the way.


Hamdi Chatti – CEO, Christofle, reminds us that by designing beautiful products, mastering manufacturing and delivering the ultimate retail experience worldwide, Christofle is contributing to Vision 2033.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2064&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-1-min.png> 	

Vote for Love Note by Ghawali



Love Note by Ghawali has been shortlisted for the Pure Beauty Awards 2025 in the Best New Fragrance category!

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2064&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-1-min.png> 	

Vote for Love Note by Ghawali



Love Note by Ghawali has been shortlisted for the Pure Beauty Awards 2025 in the Best New Fragrance category! 

We’d love your support—help us bring this award home by casting your vote here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2065&user=10620> 

Together, let’s make Love Note a winner! 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2065&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-3-min.png> 	

Voice of Fashion

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2066&user=10620> 	

We’re excited to launch Voice of Fashion, a new initiative to empower and celebrate our back-office talents. This platform amplifies ideas, fosters creativity and collaboration, and highlights 12 inspiring voices with opportunities for visibility and influence. Like Liz Wiseman’s Multipliers, it reminds us that by elevating unheard voices, we shape the future of fashion together.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2066&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/06-4-min.png> 	

On Time. On Point

chunks.text:
We’re excited to launch Voice of Fashion, a new initiative to empower and celebrate our back-office talents. This platform amplifies ideas, fosters creativity and collaboration, and highlights 12 inspiring voices with opportunities for visibility and influence. Like Liz Wiseman’s Multipliers, it reminds us that by elevating unheard voices, we shape the future of fashion together.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2066&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/06-4-min.png> 	

On Time. On Point



Chalhoub University has launched a new programme to empower our Delivery Captains with the skills to create memorable customer experiences. As the final touchpoint in the e-commerce journey, they carry the responsibility of delivering with precision, trust, and care embodying the luxury experience our customers remember us for.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2067&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2067&user=10620> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2068&user=10620>

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group family.
